channel.title: Openai.com/Blog on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Openai.com/Blog on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Introducing ChatGPT Go, now available worldwide
item.description: ChatGPT Go is now available worldwide, offering expanded access to GPT-5.2 Instant, higher usage limits, and longer memory—making advanced AI more affordable globally. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/introducing-chatgpt-go

item.title: Our approach to advertising and expanding access to ChatGPT
item.description: OpenAI plans to test advertising in the U.S. for ChatGPT’s free and Go tiers to expand affordable access to AI worldwide, while protecting privacy, trust, and answer quality. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/our-approach-to-advertising-and-expanding-access

item.title: Investing in Merge Labs
item.description: OpenAI is investing in Merge Labs to support new brain computer interfaces that bridge biological and artificial intelligence to maximize human ability, agency, and experience. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/investing-in-merge-labs

item.title: Strengthening the U.S. AI supply chain through domestic manufacturing
item.description: OpenAI launches a new RFP to strengthen the U.S. AI supply chain by accelerating domestic manufacturing, creating jobs, and scaling AI infrastructure. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/strengthening-the-us-ai-supply-chain

item.title: OpenAI partners with Cerebras
item.description: OpenAI partners with Cerebras to add 750MW of high-speed AI compute, reducing inference latency and making ChatGPT faster for real-time AI workloads. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/cerebras-partnership

item.title: OpenAI and SoftBank Group partner with SB Energy
item.description: OpenAI and SoftBank Group partner with SB Energy to develop multi-gigawatt AI data center campuses, including a 1.2 GW Texas facility supporting the Stargate initiative. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/stargate-sb-energy-partnership

item.title: Datadog uses Codex for system-level code review
item.description: OpenAI and Datadog brand graphic with the OpenAI wordmark on the left, the Datadog logo on the right, and a central abstract brown fur-like texture panel on a white background. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/datadog
